<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:cadbb407979a4110002ffef3a253af9c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Reservation duration type</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	g_form.clearMessages();
	
	if(g_form.getValue("duration_type") == "daily" ){
		var startTimeValue = g_form.getValue("u_start_time");
		var endTimeValue = g_form.getValue("u_end_time");
	
		if(startTimeValue != "")
			g_form.setValue("u_start_time",startTimeValue.split(" ")[0] +" "+ "00:00:00");
		if(endTimeValue != "")
			g_form.setValue("u_end_time",endTimeValue.split(" ")[0] +" "+ "23:59:00");
		
	}

	if(newValue == "hourly" ){
	
		var script4 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
		script4.addParam("sysparm_name", "intervalIsNotEqualToHour");
		script4.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_time"));
		script4.addParam("sysparm_eTime", g_form.getValue("u_end_time"));
		
		script4.getXML(intervalIsNotEqualToHour);
	}
	
	function intervalIsNotEqualToHour(response){
			var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			if(scriptResponse == "true"){
				g_form.addInfoMessage("Schedule must be exact an hour");
			} else{
				g_form.clearMessages();
			}
	}	
	
	
// 	if(newValue == "daily" ){
// 		var script5 = new GlideAjax("ReservationClientUtils");
	
		
// 		script5.addParam("sysparm_name", "intervalIsNotEqualtoDay");
// 		script5.addParam("sysparm_sTime", g_form.getValue("u_start_date"));
// 		script5.addParam("sysparm_eTime", g_form.getValue("u_end_date"));
		
// 		script5.getXML(intervalIsNotEqualtoDay);
// 	}
	
// 	function intervalIsNotEqualtoDay(response){
// 		var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
// 			if(scriptResponse == "true"){
// 				g_form.clearMessages();
// 				g_form.addInfoMessage("Duration must be exact a day ");
// 			} else{
// 				g_form.clearMessages();
// 			}
// 	}	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-31 01:36:51</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>af1faeb197620110002ffef3a253af15</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Reservation duration type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_af1faeb197620110002ffef3a253af15</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-02 05:10:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
